name: Back 2 Alive
description:
Back 2 Alive is a First Person, Survival horror game set in a city, you play as a survivor of a zombie outbreak who will do anything to escape the zombie hordes that swarm at you.

You must use your instinct to survive and tap into your survival skills by scavenging for loot such as guns and medical supplies on your path to survival.

There will be a variety of zombies for you to go up against so make sure you’re ready because some will be able to incapacitate you while others will deal damage to you over time.
